text.div:
These requirements apply to the actor Server Actor 1

req-1SHALL

The server SHALL support expanding value sets

Links:

  • Satisfied By: http://hl7.org/fhir/R5/terminology-service.html
  • Source: Practitioner Grahame Grieve
requirement-2SHALL

Operations based on the codeSystem resource SHALL have the same result whether or not the relationships are represented explicitly as properties or implicitly using the CodeSystem resource hierarchy

Links:

  • Source: Jose Costa Teixeira

statement.requirement: The server *SHALL* support expanding value sets

statement.label: requirement-2
statement.requirement: Operations based on the codeSystem resource *SHALL* have the same result whether or not the relationships are represented explicitly as properties or implicitly using the ```CodeSystem``` resource hierarchy
